content.label: I really like it but I think it would be better if it had a build mode! Like you can build your own maps and people could join it! You could have a  couple of saves but like you could pay for more saves and loads! Just a suggestion great game btw! 10/10

title.label: Swipe control annoying on newer iPhones

content.label: Would be 5/5 but the swipe controls frequently pull open my iOS menus or switch applications. I would be great to have on screen buttons as an alternative because it’s very annoying.

When I first saw this game which was around 3 or 4 years ago, I bought it and had a lot of fun with it! I had to buy some solutions but most of them were really fun and not too difficult. I loved beating the levels and watching the after level death scene. I really hope this game gets featured somewhere else on a bigger platform or advertiser. Good Job with this and please make a second game!

title.label: Can you add a killer from dead by daylight

content.label: It would be really cool if you added someone from dbd like trapper

The game is simple and enjoyable puzzle game. I definitely recommend. 

However, last update removed stickers for me.  Please re add, or fix if this was a mistake.

First off, I love the new update. I’ve always wanted to play the Santa’s Slay levels but couldn’t be bothered to download the Steam version, and the new NC-17 stuff is great as well, but there is a problem. I’ve always loved the VHS boxes, as they have always been fun to read, but now when I tap them, they just exit out of the VHS. Is that supposed to happen? Is that just a new part of the game? Also I can’t buy the Street Sweeper in the shop

The intro cutscenes are funny and the way that everyone screams, oh and also who could forget about the, “Ow, my pancreas!” When you load into the game. Overall, this game is just amazing and I really hope that more people start to play it. Peace! 🤘
I’ve already beaten it once on my phone but enjoyed it so much I don’t mind getting a second chance to play through the game. Definitely worth playing ❤️❤️
Good but please add a level editor I love game plz add level editor
I like it game! 👺🔪😵

FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THAT IS HOLY. WHEN THE F@&! ARE YOU GOING TO UPDATE THE SCREEN SIZE TO THE FULL SIZE. THIS GAME WOULD BE 5 STARS IF THE DEVELOPERS ACTUALLY UPDATED THEIR GAME TO THE NEW SCREEN SIZES LIKE EVERY OTHER APP. COME ON, DUDES.
Great puzzle game! Humorous, gory, and adorable!
And I was happy to give it.
Terrible on iPod. Touch controls on iPod are bad. Also has a 2 second delay which makes it hard to play. All my other games work great on my 5th gen iPod running OS 9.32.
Blood death and wits combined into one! Fun and cute with a side of blood and bones nicely done!😁

An amazingly complex puzzle game filled with numerous 80s horror references in the form of cute, blocky figures.

A must have for any true horror buff.

Pretty good sliding block style puzzles styled as a slasher movie series. Nice as a diversion and easy to fit in around other responsibilities with the turn based play. Rewind/fast forward/reset buttons make it easy to go back to earlier parts in a puzzle or to undo mistakes/fumbling.
It’s awsome but you should make more levels if you do that would be great😃
I love games that make you think, as well as slashers from the glorious 80s.  This is the perfect combination of the two.
MAKE IT FREE AGAIN

Great puzzles that keep you thinking. Different obstacles to keep it fresh. Further most me being an old horror fan, all the old references and such nothing sort but phenomenal. 

I’ll buy this game on any system or phone with a question.

I got this after finishing the Friday the 13th game. This, I believe, predates the other and its graphics are a bit more crude and the puzzles I bit easier to solve, but it’s still a fantastic game. I’m a big fan of these and I hope there will be more in the future. I can see it now, a Hellraiser, Halloween, and Nightmare on Elm Street (etc) version.

title.label: Not as good as Jason puzzles.

content.label: The app is fun, but there are alot of puzzles that are the same as the Friday the 13th puzzle game. Alot of the levels are way too simple- unless I'm that good lol. Great game still overall.

Well made puzzle game, will keep you occupied for hours. The music, screams, sound effects will make you chuckle. Give a try, will not disappoint. I’ve already recommended this game to a few of my friends and they’re all loving it. Well done developers, thanks for the entertainment.
Could be a fun game if it ever worked.

I love horror and dig that I can carry this gem around with me, started with the free Friday the 13th spin-off and after finishing that it was enough to convince me that this was absolutely worth the price
This is an awesome game and one of the best games and Skullface is so Awesome!!!!!👍🏻👌🏻
Once you start you can't stop.

This game does just as good as it does on pc, home consoles, and the switch. Many cool characters to chose, 10/10 puzzles, and a unique story with many gore packs. Please continue Slayaway and make more games and characters to It.
Beautiful gorgeous best game you rock skull face

title.label: Reminds me of the old Friday the 13th movies

content.label: This is a super fun and somewhat challenging horror game. I’m having a blast.

This game nailed a deadly combo of engaging, challenging, interesting puzzles with over-the-top horror and graphic violence. Granted, said violence is in the form of cartoony block characters, so it’s a sickening twist of comically cute gore. As a pretty “old” gamer, this adult themed game reminds me of the Wii game Madworld, which ended up sucking because the game itself was extremely repetitive and too boring for the gore to save it. Slayaway Camp instead is a great game packaged in a gory case. It will keep the most serious of us puzzlers occupied for hours and give us a few giggles and satisfying Mortal Kombat type finish moves along the way. The gameplay reminds me of my favorite mobile game of all time, King Rabbit, with cute murderers rather then cute bunnies. If you like this or that, you will like the other. I’ve never felt so guilty busting a smile or chuckle once in a while. What a game. Well done developers!
Update:
Still loving this. I was afraid the variety would end and the game would get boring after the first few camps. Wrong! You have to play to appreciate, but the police, telephones, swat team people, and light switches make the puzzles practically limitless. The cats are my favorite - game is about killing people, but touch or drown a cat and you’re busted for animal cruelty. This game = epic!

Considering the price of this is way more on consoles and pc this is a great puzzle gem - yes gem - translated to iPhones it doesn’t lose any of its charm and is great - ima cheapskate and I was compelled to buy this - give it a try people
Adam

Yes, my title says “5-Star Game”, but I’ve dropped it a star with my rating.  This in ONLY because the game needs an iPhone X screen size update.  It quickly becomes frustrating to load an app/game with so much unused screen space.

The game itself is an incredibly awesome puzzle game, with great graphics and perfect sounds to accompany.  Gameplay is simple, yet finding the solutions to the puzzles is far from easy.
Tons o' Fun. A puzzle game full of 1980's slasher tropes and nods to horror films new and old. I love this game.

Honestly this gave me a lot of nostalgia.This reminds of those old classics like Friday the 13th and nightmare on elm street.I just can't stop playing this,I want to say thanks for making this a enjoyable experience.
Great game low price
I bought all the dlc, deleted the game, and now my dlc is gone and I have to buy it again!!!! Please fix this problem and maybe get my dlc back! :(
This game seems really simple on the outside, but is actually one of the best games I have ever played.
This game is a great puzzle game with amazing gory artstyle
So ever since I got the update this app has been crashing constantly. In the middle of levels too. I LOVE this game but I don’t want it to crash.
I have this on two PCs and my phone. Really like it.

UPDATE review for updated game. 
Holy cow this game just keeps getting better. Developer just added more free levels and they rock. 
Slayaway camp is a hoot. It's just a puzzle game but the hilarious way it's presented is the best part. Even when you fail it's a joy hearing the closing credit song and seeing the credits roll. Different cast just about every time lol. It pokes fun at all those silly 80's slasher movies we grew up on in a way that makes me want to see them all again. Levels are presented in an old video store style that’s so funny.

If you're a fan of slasher films like Friday the 13th, Halloween, or Nightmare on Elm St., you need to pick this game up. It's completely worth the price! This game is also great for fans of puzzle games. It's unique game mechanics and atmosphere will draw you in immediately! Please, do yourself a favor and buy this game, it's only $1.99 for god's sake.

title.label: And now for something completely different.

content.label:
In a world where most puzzle games are a variation of Candy Crush (which is really a variation of Tetris,) it’s refreshing to see something completely different, especially if you’re a fan of horror films.

Not only is the main game strategy based, and with no shortage of levels and playable characters, but there’s also the “Faces of Killed” sub game which is more of a mindless time waster. 

And while I’ve had this app for a while, I never got around to rating it, however, the recent induction of Bob as a playable character was epic enough that I had to finally do so.

title.label: BEST OF ALL SCARY INDIE GAME EVER

content.label: Great, you guys may have seen my review before and saw my suggestion of adding avp characters and added an alien from "Aliens" by Ridley Scott , thank you so much for adding this but you only finished 50% of my suggestion and maybe you guys can add a predator since there will be a new movie about it.
The nerd in me loves every part of this game! The references, the puzzles, the hilarious kills, it's the best app game I've ever played!
Great graphics, gameplay and mechanics(the killers look awesome,too!!)
You like puzzles? You like blood? You like 80s horror movies? Then this is the game for you!!!
